column.name: org_unit_level
column.text: 组织单元级别（1集团2区域公司3公司4管理项目5部门6工作组）

column.name: type_prop
column.text: 单元属性: 1=填报单元 2=汇总单元

statements.statement:
select A.* ,B.org_unit_name pname,C.type_prop from t_org_unit_info A left join t_org_unit_info B on A.parent_org_unit_id=B.org_unit_id left join ets_budget.t_unit_budget C on A.org_unit_id = C.unit_id where 1=1
<#if query??> <#-- -------------------关键字查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( A.org_unit_name like '%${key}%' or A.org_unit_fullname like '%${key}%' or A.org_node_path like '%${key}%' or A.createby_name like '%${key}%' or A.updateby_name like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and A.org_unit_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.idNotIn??> and A.org_unit_id not in (${query.idNotIn}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.org_unit_id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.pid??> and A.parent_org_unit_id = ${query.pid} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.org_unit_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.fullName??> and A.org_unit_fullname = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.fullName)}' </#if>
<#if query.type??> and A.org_unit_level = ${query.type} </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and A.order_no = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.nodePath??> and A.org_node_path = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.nodePath)}' </#if>
<#-- 结点下的所有节点(多层) --> <#if query.nodePath2??> and A.org_node_path like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.nodePath2)}' </#if>
<#if query.etsId??> and A.ets_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.etsId)}' </#if>
<#if query.etsParentid??> and A.ets_parentid = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.etsParentid)}' </#if>
<#if query.createUserId??> and A.createby = ${query.createUserId} </#if>
<#if query.createUserName??> and A.createby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateUserId??> and A.updateby = ${query.updateUserId} </#if>
<#if query.updateUserName??> and A.updateby_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateUserName)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateTimeBegin?? && query.updateTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#-- 用户的组织机构 --> <#if query.userId??> and A.org_unit_id in (select org_unit_id from t_org_duties_info where duties_id in(select duties_id from t_user_duties where user_id =${query.userId})) </#if>
<#if query.sortOrder?? && query.sortField??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} </#if>
</#if>
select A.* ,B.org_unit_name pname from t_org_unit_info A left join t_org_unit_info B on A.parent_org_unit_id=B.org_unit_id where 1=1
select * from t_org_unit_info where org_unit_id in (select org_unit_id from t_org_duties_info where duties_id in (SELECT duties_id FROM t_user_duties where user_id=${userId} and duties_type=1))
